concept.title: Error Functions
concept.shortdesc: Error functions provide information about bad records. The expression language provides the following error functions:

dlentry.dd: Returns the name of the stage that sent the record to error.
Returns the error code for the bad record.
Returns the error message for the bad record.
Returns the ID of the that sent the record to error. Returns the format <hostname>:<port>.
The name of pipeline that sent the record to error.
The time the record was sent to error.
